Sentece: Complete restriction of kidney blood flow by bilateral suture-ligation of the renal arteries compared with sham-treated animals reduced the clearance of hBNP by approximately half (24 +/- 9 ml/min versus 47 +/- 14 ml/min, respectively, p <. 007).
